findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights may prevent the Disclosing Party from verifying compliance with confidentiality obligations, increasing the risk of misuse of confidential information.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The lack of intellectual property provisions can lead to uncertainty regarding the ownership and use of any intellectual property developed during the agreement.
Indemnification being limited to requirements by law may not fully protect the Disclosing Party against all potential claims arising from breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: The Receiving Party shall indemnify the Disclosing Party to the extent required by law.
